definition: to alter (text)/to change by painting over/to correct (with correction fluid)
to apply (paint etc)/to smear/to daub/to blot out/to scribble/to scrawl/(literary) mud/street

sentences.english: I want a pair of scissors and a bottle of whiteout.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一支剪刀和一瓶涂改液。

sentences.english: Can you white out those letters at the edge of the page?
sentences.chinese: 你能用涂改液涂去这一页边上的这些字母吗？

sentences.english: You are to use ink, make no erasures.
sentences.chinese: 务必使用钢笔，而且不能涂改。

sentences.english: Uncertified alterations or erasures shall invalidate the certificates.
sentences.chinese: 证书未经证明而涂改应属无效。

sentences.english: Please sign against any alternations you make on the form.
sentences.chinese: 表格上如有任何涂改，请在旁签署。

sentences.english: Once the Protect to fix card or purchasing invoice has been changed, the protection to fix immediately expired.
sentences.chinese: 保修卡及购机发票一经涂改，保修即时失效。

sentences.english: The loss of the declaration or any alterations made on it may be considered breaking the regulations.
sentences.chinese: 凡遗失本单或申报单作涂改均被认作违法。

sentences.english: We understand that price also included a year's supply of Wite-Out correction fluid.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道，价格还包括了一年的涂改液供应。

sentences.english: Membership card would become invalid if altered or seriously damaged.
sentences.chinese: 会员证一经涂改或严重损毁均告无效。

sentences.english: Dig-mend and oblidteration are the main tricks used for counterfeiting lottery tickets.
sentences.chinese: 伪造彩票所用的手法主要是挖补法和涂改法。

sentences.english: Could you use the correction fluid to alter the letter on the page.
sentences.chinese: 你能用涂改液涂去这一页边上的这些字母吗？

sentences.english: I correct my mistake with white - out.
It can white out the black letter on paper.
sentences.chinese: 这种白色的涂改液可以涂掉纸上的黑字。

sentences.english: Bar code products on signs of damage or defacement .
sentences.chinese: 产品上条形码破损或有涂改痕迹。

definition: to obliterate (some words, or part of a picture etc) using correction fluid, ink, paint etc/to paint out/to paint over
to transcribe/to make a fair copy
